org.jetel.graph.runtime

Class SingleThreadWatchDog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.WatchDog
      • org.jetel.graph.runtime.SingleThreadWatchDog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<Result>, CloverPost

    public class SingleThreadWatchDog
extends WatchDog
    Alternative implementation of WatchDog. This kind of WatchDog does not run each component in separate thread, but ensures, that the complete transformation is performed in a single thread. Slightly different progress logging is provided by this watchdog. Operation abort() is not supported. Instead, just call interrupt on the single thread.
